! A stack of books: Since the war began ticking time period, a disaster. The Giants led Kamael defied the gods. It angered the very Einhasad. Goddess lifted Star Hammer and destroyed the empire and the island of giants Granperion E Saghir. Several fortresses around Granperiona still tried to resist, but the loss of the ruling elite took their last hope for victory. Most castles were conquered and destroyed. Cave of the Giants was the last large-scale resisting strength. [Quest _10293_SevenSignsForbiddenBook book_q10293_0.htm|Choose this book]
